name: Flowbot
headline: A natural language-driven programming assistant.
generated_description:
Flowbot is an innovative startup on a mission to redefine programming through natural language. Essentially, they're building a programming assistant that allows users to interact and write code using everyday language, making coding more accessible to everyone. 

Founded in New York and part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S19, Flowbot embodies the spirit of startups that are not just looking to solve problems but are doing so in a radically user-friendly way. The company operates with a lean team of just two employees, which speaks volumes about their focus and efficiency.

Their website—[getflowbot.com](https://www.getflowbot.com)—is where you can find more about what they’re building. While details about their specific offerings are currently not available, their tags—'artificial-intelligence', 'NLP', and 'New York'—hint at a strong emphasis on cutting-edge technology and language processing.

Flowbot occupies an exciting space at the intersection of AI and programming, and it’s interesting to watch how they will evolve in the landscape of tech. Keep an eye on them; they may very well be the friendliest gateway into programming that the tech world has seen.
